message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering purchasing our product. We're excited to work with you. After reviewing your budget, we're willing to offer you the product at a price of $9000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value the product can bring to your business.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the discount, $9000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $8500 for the product, which is a fair price considering my budget and the value I'm getting. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After reconsidering, we're willing to meet you halfway and offer the product at a price of $8750. We believe this is a fair compromise considering the value the product can bring to your business.
